teaser: There's a lot of tech news out there about gadgets and software, but not many people look deeply and directly at the big question: Is technology making humanity better or worse? New York Times and Wired Magazine contributor Clive Thompson has a new book called 'Smarter Than You Think: How Technology Is Changing Our Minds for The Better.'
byline: Bruce Johnson, Sabri Ben-Achour and David Gura
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, September 30, 2013
description: There's a lot of tech news out there about gadgets and software, but not many people look deeply and directly at the big question: Is technology making humanity better or worse? New York Times and Wired Magazine contributor Clive Thompson has a new book called 'Smarter Than You Think: How Technology Is Changing Our Minds for The Better.'
